name: Burn
display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.

name: Avoid
display_help: Foes will avoid this area.

name: Stun_Grenades
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has Disoriented you with his Stun Grenade.

display_help: The Knives of Artemis mercenary has lowered your defense with her Blade

name: Paralytic_Dart
display_help: You have been hit with a Paralytic Dart. You cannot move.

name: Cloaking_Device
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Poison_Dart
display_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison.

name: Web_Grenade
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilizes, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

name: Sap_Shot
display_help: This Dart was filled with a deadly Narcotic. You are poisoned and unable to Regenerate your wounds. You probably will pass out.

name: Sleep_Gas
display_help: Anyone that passes through this gas will take damage from the fumes.

name: Vest
display_help: Gunslingers wear an advanced Vest that protects them from all damage except psionics.

name: Hollow_Round
display_help: Fires a large caliber hollow tip rounds from both guns that can knock down foes.

name: Incendiary_Round
display_help: The Gunslingers Incendiary round has ignited you!

name: Liquid_Nitrogen_Round
display_help: The Gunslingers Liquid Nitrogen round has frozen you solid!

name: Explosive_Tip
display_help: Explosive Tip rounds can affect foes in a small area. The force of the explosion can knock down foes.

name: Rapid_Fire
display_help: The Gunslinger can fire off a quick burst of lead in a wide cone.

name: Narcotic_Dart
display_help: This Dart was filled with a deadly Narcotic. You are poisoned and unable to Regenerate your wounds. You probably will pass out.

name: Teleport
display_help: Gunslingers can Teleport long distances

name: Resistance
display_help: Hercules Titans are resistant to all damage. Since they are machines, they are immune to Sleep and Fear powers.

name: Auto_Turret
display_help: Places a stationary Auto Turret on the ground. The Auto Turret has an extremely fast fire rate and is equipped with a customized tracking system. Once locked on, the Turret will continue to unload a volley of lead into the target until it is destroyed or is out of range. The Turret is armored, but can be destroyed. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Very Long
